titleStmt.title: Navigation rectified: or, the common chart proved to be the only true chart. By Peter Blackborow
titleStmt.author: Blackborow, Peter.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Playford, and are to be sold by Joseph Hindmarsh, bookseller to His Royal Highness, at the Black Bull in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
